record.description: University of Chicago booth, Illinois Centennial Exhibition at Springfield, autumn 1918. [Represented among all the state's educational institutions, Chicago's exhibit demonstrated the development of the university from its foundation to the present day. Dr. Ernest De Witt Burton was exhibit committee chair, and assistant librarian Edward A. Henry (Class of 1907) had charge of the university's booth].
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Caption taken from Jan., 1919 UC Magazine, p. 89-caption is probably the original written for both photos, some extraneous parts are edited out. Mounted on board, copy has archives stamp.
